metadata.name: HackTool - Sliver C2 Implant Activity Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects process activity patterns as seen being used by Sliver C2 framework implants

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-noexit -command [console]::outputencoding=[text.utf8encoding]::utf8')))

output.summary: Detects process activity patterns as seen being used by Sliver C2 framework implants
